What country is ð¦ð±?

People often ask which country uses ð¦ð± emoji flag. The answer is Albania . Albania is located in Southeast Europe continent. The country area is 28748 km2, and the capital city is Tirana ( 41.3275 , 19.81889 ). Some of the neighboring countries are Montenegro, Greece, North Macedonia, Kosovo , and the country is not landlocked. Some of the timezones in Albania are UTC+01:00 . The currency used in Albania is Albanian lek ( ALL ). People in Albania speak mostly Albanian . Albania is part of the Southeast Europe region.
